Nanopore requests absorbance profiles from Group 2 extractions (though yes, I should already have performed this QC step)

Using the Epoch spectrophotometer. Loaded 3 blanks of 3uL Zymo Elution Buffer. CV% \<10%, so accepted. Loaded 51861, 51732, and 51892 (for each, 1uL extraction + 2uL Zymo EB).

Full results saved in OneDrive, files titled "epoch_group2\*.xlsx.

| Catalog \# | 260/280 | 260/230 | ng/uL  |
|------------|---------|---------|--------|
| 51861      | 1.866   | 2.256   | 38.433 |
| 51732      | 1.845   | 2.169   | 62.533 |
| 51892      | 1.808   | 2.013   | 70.33  |
